<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/governance/lifecycle/scheduled/trigger-due"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint is typically called by a background job scheduler.
Processes all scheduled transitions that are due for execution.

  parameters={undefined}
>
